sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Chart as ChartJS, CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend } from 'chart.js'; import { Bar } from 'react-chartjs-2'; import apiService from '../services/apiService'; import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar'; import LoadingSpinner from '../components/LoadingSpinner'; import ProjectCard from '../components/ProjectCard'; ChartJS.register(CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend); const OrganisationOverview = () => { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); const { data: stats, isLoading } = useQuery('orgStats', apiService.getDashboardStats, { refetchInterval: 5000 // Auto-refresh every 5 seconds }); const { data: projectsData } = useQuery('orgProjects', () => apiService.getProjects(), { refetchInterval: 5000 // Auto-refresh every 5 seconds }); if (isLoading) return ; const projects = projectsData?.results || []; const myProjects = projects.filter(p => p.organisation_name === JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}').organisation); const projectFundingData = { labels: myProjects.slice(0, 5).map(p => p.title.substring(0, 20) + '...'), datasets: [{ label: t('funding'), data: myProjects.slice(0, 5).map(p => p.current_funding || 0), backgroundColor: 'rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.8)', }] }; return (
{/* Stats Grid */}
#

{t('myProjects')}

{myProjects.length}

$

{t('totalReceived')}

${myProjects.reduce((sum, p) => sum + (p.current_funding || 0), 0).toLocaleString()}

%

{t('targetAmount')}

${myProjects.reduce((sum, p) => sum + (p.target_amount || 0), 0).toLocaleString()}

R

{t('reports')}

{stats?.total_reports || 0}

{/* Project Funding Chart */} {myProjects.length > 0 && (

{t('projectFunding')}

)} {/* Recent Projects */}

{t('recentProjects')}

{myProjects.length > 0 ? (
{myProjects.slice(0, 3).map((project) => ( ))}
) : (
[ ]

{t('noProjects')}

{t('createFirstProject')}

)}
); }; const OrganisationProjects = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); const { data: projectsData, isLoading } = useQuery('orgProjects', () => apiService.getProjects(), { refetchInterval: 5000 // Auto-refresh every 5 seconds }); if (isLoading) return ; const projects = projectsData?.results || []; const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); const myProjects = projects.filter(p => p.organisation_name === user.organisation); return (

{t('myProjects')}

{myProjects.length === 0 ? (
[ ]

{t('noProjects')}

{t('createFirstProject')}

) : (
{myProjects.map((project) => (

{project.title}

{project.status === 'pending' ? 'â³ Pending Approval' : project.status === 'approved' ? 'âœ… Approved' : project.status === 'active' ? 'ðŸŸ¢ Active' : project.status === 'rejected' ? 'âŒ Rejected' : project.status === 'completed' ? 'âœ”ï¸ Completed' : project.status}

{project.description?.substring(0, 100)}...

{t('target')} ${project.target_amount?.toLocaleString()}
{t('raised')} ${project.current_funding?.toLocaleString() || 0}
))}
)}
); }; const CreateProject = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: '', description: '', budget: '', location: '', start_date: '', end_date: '', sector: '', beneficiaries: '' }); const { refetch: refetchProjects } = useQuery('orgProjects', () => apiService.getProjects()); const { refetch: refetchStats } = useQuery('orgStats', apiService.getDashboardStats); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const result = await apiService.createProject(formData); alert(t('projectCreatedPendingApproval')); setFormData({ title: '', description: '', budget: '', location: '', start_date: '', end_date: '', sector: '', beneficiaries: '' }); // Refresh data await refetchProjects(); await refetchStats(); } catch (error) { console.error('Project creation error:', error); alert(t('error') + ': ' + JSON.stringify(error)); } }; return (

{t('createProject')}

Fill in the details below to submit a new project for approval

{/* Project Details Section */}

Project Details

setFormData({...formData, title: e.target.value})} placeholder="e.g., Clean Water Access - Juba" className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-transparent" required />
